ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] Re: Character code conversion
ygData.msgSnippet: Heritrix does not have a way to normalize the character encoding of text/html written to the ARC file. You do not say how you are trying to search the contents

Heritrix does not have a way to normalize the character encoding of
text/html written to the ARC file.

You do not say how you are trying to search the contents of the ARC
file. I can think of two ways:

1) You uncompress each .arc.gz file so that you have the plane text
   versions.

2) You use 'arcreader' to extract each ARC record.

If you do (1), there isn't much you can do.

If you do (2), you can pipe the output of 'arcreader' through iconv to
transcode, then pipe that into grep.

    -tree
